Ability.Name: [Misc] Profile Init
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------------------ -- Variables & Sanity checks ------------------------ -- PQInterface if not IsAddOnLoaded("PQInterface") then PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9The AddOn PQInterface is not loaded or installed!|cffffffff","Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9Version 2.22+ is required to run the profile.|cffffffff","Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9You can get the latest version at this location:|cffffffff","Notice") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9http://pqrotation.wikia.com/wiki/PQInterface|cffffffff","Notice") PQR_StopRotation() return true else local PQIver = tonumber(GetAddOnMetadata("PQInterface","Version")) if PQIver < 2.22 then PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9Your PQInterface version is outdated!|cffffffff","Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9Version 2.22+ is required to run the profile, you have version "..PQIver.."!|cffffffff","Warning") PQR_WriteToChat("") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9You can get the latest version at this location:|cffffffff","Notice") PQR_WriteToChat("|cff9482C9http://pqrotation.wikia.com/wiki/PQInterface|cffffffff","Notice") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end
-- Initialize Load-Once Settings if PQR_RotationStarted then PQR_RotationStarted = false
-- Load Data Files if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_Hysteria_Data.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737PQR_Hysteria_Data.lua failed to load. Make sure it's in your Data folder!|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_PQI.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("|cffb73737PQR_PQI.lua failed to load. Make sure it's in your Data folder!|cffffffff", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end
if not mentallyShadowFirstStart then -- Initialize Event Tracker local Hysteria = CreateFrame("Frame") Hysteria:RegisterEvent("COMBAT_LOG_EVENT_UNFILTERED") Hysteria:SetScript("OnEvent", HysteriaFrame_OnEvent) Hysteria:Show()
mentallyShadowFirstStart = true PQR_WriteToChat("|cffffffffHysteria Demonology Warlock data is |cff82cee7Loaded!|cffffffff") end end
-- Slash Command Queue SLASH_ecast1 = "/ecast" function SlashCmdList.ecast(ecast, editbox) if tonumber(ecast) ~= nil then PQ_QueuedSpell = ecast else print("You can only pass a spell ID to /ecast!") end end
-- Initialize Variables PQR_ResetMovementTime = 0.3 PQR_SpellAvailableTime = ((select(3,GetNetStats()) + select(4,GetNetStats())) / 1000)
-- Initialize Trinkets local itemCheck = itemCheck local visionTrinket = visionTrinket if itemCheck(visionTrinket) == 1 then UVLS = true else UVLS = false end
------------------------------------------------------------ -- Misc. Checks ------------------------ -- Reset DoT Tracker if we're not in combat if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") and #dotTracker > 0 then dotTracker = {} end
-- We want to pause the entire profile when we're doing certain things.. if UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") -- Snap! Deaded or UnitBuffID("player",104934) -- Eating (Feast/Banquet) or UnitBuffID("player",80169) -- Eating Normal or UnitBuffID("player",87959) -- Drinking Normal or UnitBuffID("player",11392) -- 18 sec Invis Pot (for CMs) or UnitBuffID("player",3680) -- 15 sec Invis pot (for CMs) or IsMounted() -- Mounted, lol. Get it? then return true end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Automatic Buffing
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_IF = PQ_IF local PQ_PWF = PQ_PWF local PQ_SForm = PQ_SForm local PQ_Round = PQ_Round local PQ_AuraInfo = PQ_AuraInfo local GCD = PQ_Round(1.5 / ((UnitSpellHaste("player") / 100) + 1),2) + 0.2 local permanentBuffs = {PQ_IF,PQ_SForm,PQ_PWF}
-- Global Cooldown.. Make me laugh. if GCD <= 1 then GCD = 1 end
-- Buff cleanly, please! if not buffTimer then buffTimer = 0 end if GetTime() - buffTimer > GCD then for i=1,#permanentBuffs do if IsPlayerSpell(permanentBuffs[i]) then if permanentBuffs[i] == PQ_PWF then if not PQ_AuraInfo(2,"player") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(permanentBuffs[i]),"player") buffTimer = GetTime() return true end else if not UnitBuffID("player",permanentBuffs[i]) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(permanentBuffs[i]),"player") buffTimer = GetTime() return true end end end end end
-- Raid Buffing if PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_RaidBuffing_enable then if IsInRaid() then group = "raid" elseif IsInGroup() then group = "party" else return false end
for i=1,GetNumGroupMembers() do local member = group..i if not PQ_AuraInfo(2,member) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PWF),member) == 1 then if UnitIsDeadOrGhost(member) then return false end if PQR_IsOutOfSight(member,1) then return false end
CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PWF),member) return true end end end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Combat Detection
Ability.Lua:
if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_CombatDetection_enable then return false end
if (not UnitAffectingCombat("player") and UnitExists("boss1")) or not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then return true end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Hold: Pause Rotation
[Misc] Trigger: Hold Cooldowns
Ability.Lua:
------------------------------------------------------------ -- Cooldown Hold Trigger ------------------------ if not SCDtimer then SCDtimer = 0 end if not SCD then SCD = false end if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_ToggleHoldCooldown_enable then return false end
if SCD then PQR_Event("PQR_Text", "Cooldown Hold: Enabled", nil, "DC143C") else PQR_Event("PQR_Text", "Cooldown Hold: Disabled", nil, "79BAEC") end
if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_ToggleHoldCooldown_enable and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_ToggleHoldCooldown_key) and GetTime() - SCDtimer > 1 then SCDtimer = GetTime() if SCD then SCD = false PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Hold: |cff79BAECDisabled|cffffffff", "Notice") else SCD = true PQR_WriteToChat("|cff347C2CCooldown Hold: |cffDC143CEnabled|cffffffff", "Notice") end end

Ability.Name: [Support] Healthstone
Ability.Lua:
local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo local v=PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_Healthstone_value
-- Disable ability if we disabled it in PQI if not PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_Healthstone_enable then return false end
if UnitDebuff("player",137633) or UnitDebuff("player",137552) or UnitDebuff("player",142863) or UnitDebuff("player",142864) or UnitDebuff("player",142865) then return false end
if GetItemCount(5512) > 0 and Hysteria_UnitInfo("player") <= v and PQR_SpellAvailable(5512) and GetItemCooldown(5512) == 0 then UseItemByName(5512) return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Desperate Prayer
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_DPrayer = PQ_DPrayer local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo local v=PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_DesperatePrayer_value
-- Disable ability if we disabled it in PQI if not PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_DesperatePrayer_enable then return false end
if UnitDebuff("player",137633) or UnitDebuff("player",137552) or UnitDebuff("player",142863) or UnitDebuff("player",142864) or UnitDebuff("player",142865) then return false end
if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_DPrayer) and Hysteria_UnitInfo("player") <= v and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DPrayer) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DPrayer),"player") return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Auto: Vampiric Embrace
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Embrace = PQ_Embrace local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo local Orbs = select(5,Hysteria_UnitInfo("player"))
if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_Embrace) and Orbs > 2 and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Embrace) and Hysteria_UnitInfo("player") <= 40 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Embrace),"player") return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Body and Soul
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Shield = PQ_Shield
-- Ability disabled in PQI if not PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_BodyandSoul_enable then return false end
-- Do we have Body and Soul? if IsPlayerSpell(64129) then
-- Sanity checks if not PQR_IsMoving(0.2) then return false end if UnitDebuffID("player",6788) then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Shield) then return false end
-- Run Forrest, run! CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Shield),"player") return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Mass Dispel
Ability.Lua:
if not PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_MassDispel_enable then return false end
if PQR_SpellAvailable(32375) and IsPlayerSpell(32375) and PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_MassDispel_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByID(32375) if SpellIsTargeting() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Symbiosis
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Symbiosis = PQ_Symbiosis local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo
-- Ability disabled in PQI if not PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_Symbiosis_enable then return false end
-- We don't have Symbiosis if not UnitBuffID("player",110485) then return false end
-- Tranquility is on a CD if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Symbiosis) then return false end
-- Channel Tranquility if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyDefensiveSettings_Symbiosis_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Symbiosis),"player") return true end

Ability.Name: [Misc] Spell Queue System
Ability.Lua:
if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_SpellQueueType_enable then return false end local v=PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_SpellQueueType_value or 1
if v == 1 then if IsMouseButtonDown() and UnitAffectingCombat("player") then if GetMouseFocus():GetName() ~= nil then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end end elseif v == 2 then if GetMouseFocus():GetName() ~= nil and UnitAffectingCombat("player") then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() RunMacroText("/click "..GetMouseFocus():GetName()) end else if PQ_QueuedSpell ~= nil then if PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_QueuedSpell) and IsPlayerSpell(PQ_QueuedSpell) then if lastSpell and lastSpell == PQ_QueuedSpell then PQ_QueuedSpell = nil lastSpell = nil return true end
SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_QueuedSpell),nil) lastSpell = PQ_QueuedSpell return true end PQ_QueuedSpell = nil end end

Ability.Name: [Support] Auto: Potion
Ability.Lua:
local T2D = T2D local PQ_HasHero = PQ_HasHero local SpecialUnit = SpecialUnit
-- Don't use Potion during Heroism if user tagged off automatic use if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoPotion_enable then return false end
-- Disable if we have no potions left if GetItemCount(76093) < 1 then return false end
-- Disable if Potion is on cooldown if GetItemCooldown(76093) ~= 0 then return false end
-- Disable if we're not targeting a boss if not SpecialUnit() then return false end
-- Disable if we don't have Heroism or T2D is greater than 20 seconds if not PQ_HasHero() or T2D("target") > 20 then return false end
-- At this point, we should just use the potion if all of the above is true UseItemByName(76093)

Ability.Name: [Support] Auto: Racials
Ability.Lua:
local SCD = SCD local SpecialUnit = SpecialUnit local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo
-- Don't use Racials if user tagged off automatic use if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoRacials_enable then return false end
-- Draenei: Gift of the Naaru if IsPlayerSpell(59544) and PQR_SpellAvailable(59544) and Hysteria_UnitInfo("player") < 60 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(59544),"player") return true end
-- Did we enable boss only CDs? if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_BossCooldown_enable then if not SpecialUnit() then return false end end
-- Troll: Berserking if IsPlayerSpell(26297) and not SCD then if PQR_SpellAvailable(26297) then if UnitExists("target") then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(26297),"player") return true end end end
-- Blood Elf: Arcane Torrent if IsPlayerSpell(28730) and not SCD then if PQR_SpellAvailable(28730) and select(3,Hysteria_UnitInfo("player")) < 92 and UnitExists("target") then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(28730),"player") return true end end
-- Orc: Blood Fury if IsPlayerSpell(33702) and not SCD then if PQR_SpellAvailable(33702) then if UnitExists("target") then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(33702),"player") return true end end end

Ability.Name: [Support] Frag Belt
Ability.Lua:
-- Ability disabled in PQI if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_FragBelt_enable then return false end
-- If we don't know Engineering. Don't activate. for i=1,9 do if select(7,GetProfessionInfo(i)) == 202 then hasEngi = true end end
-- Don't have Engineering. if not hasEngi then return false end
local Belt = GetInventoryItemID("player", 6)
-- Not equipped? if not IsEquippedItem(Belt) then return false end
-- Don't use it if it's on cooldown as well! if GetItemCooldown(Belt) > 0 then return false end
-- Cast Frag Belt on target during Metamorphosis if GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil and UnitIsUnit("target", "mouseover") then UseItemByName(Belt) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Auto: Shadowfiend
Ability.Lua:
local SCD = SCD local PQ_SF = PQ_SF local SpecialUnit = SpecialUnit local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
-- Ability disabled in PQI if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoShadowfiend_enable then return false end
-- Did we enable boss only CDs? if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_BossCooldown_enable then if not SpecialUnit() then return false end end
-- Cast Mindbender / Shadowfiend if TargetValidation("target", PQ_SF) and not SCD then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SF),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: [Support] Auto: Power Infusion
Ability.Lua:
local SCD = SCD local PQ_PI = PQ_PI local SpecialUnit = SpecialUnit
-- Ability disabled in PQI if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoPowerInfusion_enable then return false end
-- Did we enable boss only CDs? if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_BossCooldown_enable then if not SpecialUnit() then return false end end
-- Ability on CD if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_PI) then return false end
-- Activate Power Infusion if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_PI) and not SCD then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_PI),"player") return true end

Ability.Name: Vampiric Touch
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_VT = PQ_VT local mentallyPower = mentallyPower local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local tick = PQ_Round(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))) local GCD = PQ_Round(1.5 / ((UnitSpellHaste("player") / 100) + 1),2) local vampiricTouch = select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_VT,"PLAYER"))
if PQR_IsMoving(0.1) then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_VT) then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_VT) and isMindControledUnit("target") then local id = UnitGUID("target")
if vampiricTouch then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_VT then if mentallyPower(34914) > dotTracker[i].vtPower then if vampiricTouch - GetTime() < 10 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"target") return true end else if vampiricTouch - GetTime() < GCD or vampiricTouch - GetTime() < GCD + tick then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"target") return true end end end end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Vampiric Touch (Focus)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_VT = PQ_VT local mentallyPower = mentallyPower local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local tick = PQ_Round(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))) local GCD = PQ_Round(1.5 / ((UnitSpellHaste("player") / 100) + 1),2) local vampiricTouch = select(7,UnitDebuffID("focus",PQ_VT,"PLAYER"))
if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_FocusDotting_enable then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_VT) then return false end if PQR_IsMoving(0.1) then return false end
if TargetValidation("focus",PQ_VT) and isMindControledUnit("focus") then local id = UnitGUID("focus")
if vampiricTouch then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_VT then if mentallyPower(34914) > dotTracker[i].vtPower then if vampiricTouch - GetTime() < 10 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"focus") return true end else if vampiricTouch - GetTime() < GCD or vampiricTouch - GetTime() < GCD + tick then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"focus") return true end end end end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"focus") return true end end

Ability.Name: Vampiric Touch (Mouseover)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_VT = PQ_VT local mentallyPower = mentallyPower local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local tick = PQ_Round(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))) local GCD = PQ_Round(1.5 / ((UnitSpellHaste("player") / 100) + 1),2) local vampiricTouch = select(7,UnitDebuffID("mouseover",PQ_VT,"PLAYER"))
if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_MouseoverDotting_enable then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_VT) then return false end if PQR_IsMoving(0.1) then return false end
if TargetValidation("mouseover",PQ_VT) and isMindControledUnit("mouseover") then local id = UnitGUID("mouseover")
if vampiricTouch then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_VT then if mentallyPower(34914) > dotTracker[i].vtPower then if vampiricTouch - GetTime() < 10 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"mouseover") return true end else if vampiricTouch - GetTime() < GCD or vampiricTouch - GetTime() < GCD + tick then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"mouseover") return true end end end end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_VT),"mouseover") return true end end

Ability.Name: Vampiric Touch (Boss)
Shadow Word: Pain
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWP = PQ_SWP local mentallyPower = mentallyPower local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local tick = PQ_Round(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))) local shadowWordPain = select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_SWP,"PLAYER")) local max_timer = PQ_Round(PQ_PowerRound(18/(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))))*(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))),2)
if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWP) then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_SWP) and isMindControledUnit("target") then local id = UnitGUID("target")
if shadowWordPain then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_SWP then if UnitBuffID("player",138963) then if dotTracker[i].crit == true then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer/2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end end if dotTracker[i].crit == false then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer-1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end end else if mentallyPower(589) > dotTracker[i].swpPower then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer/2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end else if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < tick then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end end end end end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Pain (Focus)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWP = PQ_SWP local mentallyPower = mentallyPower local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local tick = PQ_Round(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))) local shadowWordPain = select(7,UnitDebuffID("focus",PQ_SWP,"PLAYER")) local max_timer = PQ_Round(PQ_PowerRound(18/(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))))*(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))),2)
if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_FocusDotting_enable then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWP) then return false end
if TargetValidation("focus",PQ_SWP) and isMindControledUnit("focus") then local id = UnitGUID("focus")
if shadowWordPain then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_SWP then if UnitBuffID("player",138963) then if dotTracker[i].crit == true then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer/2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"focus") return true end end if dotTracker[i].crit == false then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer-1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"focus") return true end end else if mentallyPower(589) > dotTracker[i].swpPower then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer/2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"focus") return true end else if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < tick then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"focus") return true end end end end end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"focus") return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Pain (Mouseover)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWP = PQ_SWP local mentallyPower = mentallyPower local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local tick = PQ_Round(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))) local shadowWordPain = select(7,UnitDebuffID("mouseover",PQ_SWP,"PLAYER")) local max_timer = PQ_Round(PQ_PowerRound(18/(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))))*(3/(1+(UnitSpellHaste("player")/100))),2)
if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_FocusDotting_enable then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWP) then return false end if not UnitExists("mouseover") then return false end
if TargetValidation("mouseover",PQ_SWP) and isMindControledUnit("mouseover") then local id = UnitGUID("mouseover")
if shadowWordPain then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_SWP then if UnitBuffID("player",138963) then if dotTracker[i].crit == true then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer/2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"mouseover") return true end end if dotTracker[i].crit == false then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer-1 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"mouseover") return true end end else if mentallyPower(589) > dotTracker[i].swpPower then if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < max_timer/2 then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"mouseover") return true end else if shadowWordPain - GetTime() < tick then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"mouseover") return true end end end end end else CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"mouseover") return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Pain (Boss)
Mind Blast
Ability.Lua:
local SCD = SCD local PQ_MB = PQ_MB local PQ_DI = PQ_DI local PQ_DP = PQ_DP local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo local Orbs = select(5,Hysteria_UnitInfo("player"))
-- Cast on the move when available if PQR_IsMoving(0.1) and UnitBuffID("player",PQ_DI) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MB),"target") return true end
-- Sanity checks if PQR_IsMoving(0.1) then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MB) then return false end if Orbs > 2 and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DP) and not SCD then return false end
-- Cast Mind Blast if TargetValidation("target",PQ_MB) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MB),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: Devouring Plague
Ability.Lua:
local SCD = SCD local PQ_MB = PQ_MB local PQ_DP = PQ_DP local PQ_SWD = PQ_SWD local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo local Orbs = select(5,Hysteria_UnitInfo("player"))
-- Sanity Checks if SCD then return false end if Orbs < 3 then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DP) then return false end
-- Cast Devouring Plague if spellCooldown(PQ_MB) < 1.5 or (Hysteria_UnitInfo("target") <= 20 and spellCooldown(PQ_SWD) <= 1.5) then if TargetValidation("target", PQ_DP) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DP),"target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Mind Blast (Movement)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_MB = PQ_MB local PQ_DI = PQ_DI local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
-- Cast on the move when available if PQR_IsMoving(0.1) and UnitBuffID("player",PQ_DI) then if TargetValidation("target",PQ_MB) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MB),"target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Pain (Movement)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWP = PQ_SWP local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit
if not PQR_IsMoving(0.1) then return false end if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWP) then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_SWP) and isMindControledUnit("target") then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Death (1)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWD = PQ_SWD local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo
-- Sanity checks if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWD) then return false end if Hysteria_UnitInfo("target") > 20 then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_SWD) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWD),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Death (2)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWD = PQ_SWD local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local Hysteria_UnitInfo = Hysteria_UnitInfo
-- Sanity checks if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWD) then return false end if Hysteria_UnitInfo("target") > 20 then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_SWD) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWD),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: Mind Spike
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_MS = PQ_MS local PQ_SOD = PQ_SOD local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
-- Sanity Checks if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MS) then return false end if not UnitBuffID("player",PQ_SOD) then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_MS) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MS),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: Level 90 Talent
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Star = PQ_Star local PQ_Halo = PQ_Halo local PQ_DStar = PQ_DStar local PQ_Cascade = PQ_Cascade local PQ_DCascade = PQ_DCascade local PQ_DarkHalo = PQ_DarkHalo
-- Halo if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_Halo) and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DarkHalo) then if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoLevel90Talent_enable then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DarkHalo),"target") return true else if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyShadow_Level90Talent_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DarkHalo),"target") return true end end end
-- Divine Star if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_Star) and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DStar) then if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoLevel90Talent_enable then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DStar),"target") return true else if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyShadow_Level90Talent_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DStar),"target") return true end end end
-- Cascade if IsPlayerSpell(PQ_Cascade) and UnitExists("target") and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_DCascade) and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("target") then if PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_AutoLevel90Talent_enable then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DCascade),"target") return true else if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyShadow_Level90Talent_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then SpellCancelQueuedSpell() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_DCascade),"target") return true end end end

Ability.Name: [Support] Dispersion
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_Disp = PQ_Disp local Hysteria_Spells = Hysteria_Spell
if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_Disp) then return false end if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_Dispersion_enable then return false end
if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_Dispersion_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() then SpellStopCasting() CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_Disp),"player") return true end

Ability.Name: Mind Flay
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_MF = PQ_MF local TargetValidation = TargetValidation
if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MF) then return false end
if TargetValidation("target",PQ_MF) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MF),"target") return true end

Ability.Name: Mind Flay (Insanity)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_MF = PQ_MF local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local devouringPlague = select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_DP,"PLAYER"))
if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MF) then return false end
if devouringPlague and devouringPlague > 0.5 then if TargetValidation("target",PQ_MF) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MF),"target") return true end end

Ability.Name: Shadow Word: Pain (UVLS)
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_SWP = PQ_SWP local TargetValidation = TargetValidation local isMindControledUnit = isMindControledUnit local shadowWordPain = select(7,UnitDebuffID("target",PQ_SWP,"PLAYER"))
if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_SWP) then return false end
if UnitBuffID("player",138963) and isMindControledUnit("target") then if #dotTracker > 0 then for i=1,#dotTracker do if dotTracker[i].guid == id and dotTracker[i].spellID == PQ_SWP then if dotTracker[i].crit == false then if TargetValidation("target",PQ_SWP) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end end end end else if TargetValidation("target",PQ_SWP) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_SWP),"target") return true end end end

Ability.Name: [AOE] Mind Sear
Ability.Lua:
local PQ_MSear = PQ_MSear
if not PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MSear) then return false end if not PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_MindSear_enable then return false end
if UnitExists("target") and IsPlayerSpell(PQ_MSear) and PQR_SpellAvailable(PQ_MSear) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and not UnitIsDeadOrGhost("target") and not PQR_IsOutOfSight("target", 1) and IsSpellInRange(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MSear), "target") == 1 and PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_MentallyOffensiveSettings_MindSear_key) then CastSpellByName(GetSpellInfo(PQ_MSear),"target") return true end
